wikipedia_page.main: Leonard Victor Astill (30 December 1916 – 25 March 1990) was an English footballer who played as a left winger in the Football League for Wolverhampton Wanderers and Blackburn Rovers. He also appeared in the Southern League for Ipswich Town and Colchester United.

link_mentions.page: List of Colchester United F.C. seasons
response: |align="left"| Len Astill Joe Birch Alec Cheyne George Law
Overall, Colchester scored 161 goals, with Arthur Pritchard netting 44 goals, George Wallis 24, and Alec Cheyne and Len Astill scoring 21 apiece.
